title: Navy Denim Jeans
description: Premium denim jeans crafted with attention to detail and superior quality materials.
full_description: Experience the perfect blend of comfort and style with our navy denim jeans. Made from high-quality materials and designed for the modern individual who values both fashion and functionality.
details: Crafted with precision and attention to detail, this denim jeans represents the perfect balance of style and functionality.

data.Features: Premium denim jeans with advanced features for modern lifestyle
data.Care: Machine washable cold, tumble dry low, iron on low heat
